snippet: A judge denied bail on Thursday for a Marietta man who prosecutors said intentionally left his 22-month-old son strapped inside a hot car to die because he wanted to live a child-free life.
abstract: Judge denies bail to Justin Ross Harris, Georgia man who prosecutors say intentionally left his 22-month-old son Cooper strapped inside hot care to die; judge finds probable cause for murder and child cruelty charges against Harris.
lead_paragraph: A judge denied bail on Thursday for a Marietta man who prosecutors said intentionally left his 22-month-old son strapped inside a hot car to die because he wanted to live a child-free life.

headline.main: Georgia: No Bail for Father of Child Who Died in Car
headline.print_headline: Georgia: No Bail for Father of Child Who Died in Car
